Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Pink Line service is still temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to an obstruction near Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service is still temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to an obstruction near Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Pulaski at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between 54th/Cermak to Pulaski, in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these buses:

  • #21 Cermak
  • #54 Cicero
  • #N60 Blue Island/26th

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
